item.title: Confluence
item.description: A living city in Faerie. Once home to The Court of Collection.

item.title: Ragnok
item.description: Previous member of Dunetideâ€™s Folly; left before Klaus, joined. Left so he could spend time with his remaining 4 fingers. Demolitions expert.

item.title: Sraptasmanr
item.description: Heir to The Mountain Court. Table Knowledge Last known status is Lost. Potentially leading a rebel force against The Mountain Court.

item.title: Mathew
item.description: A foreman of the spear making factory in East Port. Dislikes Blake Whitecap. Blames Blake and Iseah for continued production issues.

item.title: Yaros
item.description: A tiefling wizard who was assigned to help Iseah Randal in East Port.

item.title: Yana
item.description: A tiefling wizard who was assigned to help Iseah Randal in East Port.

item.title: Blake Whitecap
item.description: A human moneybags. Pushes the inventor Iseah Randal to make what he wants. Technically, they are business partners. A foreman of a warehouse.

item.title: The Kingdom of the Wing
item.description: A political entity that existed for which the area it existed was so called The Winglands.

item.title: Eric
item.description: Former Leader of The Dawn Brigade. dead.

item.title: Blackthorn
item.description: An attempted rebellion against The Empire.
